title: I Want to Shack-up
description:
Jackie knows her mom and Dr. Laura's opinion on shacking up, but she wants to do it anyway. - Dr. Laura: "Understand the ripple effects of your decisions."

Have you ignored good advice? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com
